title: Longzero ~ Long Nguyen
description: My name is Long Nguyen. I am a Front-End Web Developer obsessed with UX. I am experienced in building simple, clean and user-friendly websites for clients across the globe. Reach me on Instagram or Twitter or by email long@longzero.com.
